item.title: Python Tips and Gotchas #3 - Be more effecient with the REPL
item.description: The REPL is certainly one of Python’s most unique features. While there are other languages that also provides some kind of interactive prompt, none is as fleshed out as in Python. And while it is easy to get started with, there a few tips that will help you work faster. Interactive execution of modules and packages Probably the most useful feature of the REPL is the ability to load modules and packages in interactive mode.
